message:
Erdogan has urged "sincere" protesters in Gezi Park to pull back, warning that their environmental campaign was being hijacked by "an illegal uprising against the rule of democracy".

Police moved in to clear Taksim Square using tear gas on Tuesday evening, while earlier in the day anti-government banners had been removed.
